{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = NVIDIA Jetson TX2 Embedded System Kit |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/autonomous-machines/embedded-systems-dev-kits-modules/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = nVIDIA |model = Jetson |submodelappend = yes |submodel = TX2 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = P3310 |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless embedded board, single-board computer, development board, |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = VOB-P3310 |icid = 7361A-P3310 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = nVIDIA;Tegra X2;Parker, Jetson Tegra X2, (TE770D-A2); |cpu1_cores = 6 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Denver 2<!-- 2X ARM Denver 2 @2GHz 4x ARM (Cortex-A57) @2GHz --> |cpu1spd = 2.0 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 32 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR4 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 8 GiB |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = <!-- Connector Type --> |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth, CAN, CSI, DSI, UART, SPI, I2C, I2S, GPIO |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |category = System on Module |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 01/19/2019 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4354; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 867 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300/300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Links of Interest== * [https://developer.download.nvidia.com/embedded/L4T/r28_Release_v1.0/Docs/Jetson_TX1_and_TX2_Developer_Kits_User_Guide.pdf User Guide] *[https://www.anandtech.com/show/11185/nvidia-announces-jetson-tx2-parker ''NVIDIA Announces Jetson TX2 Embedded System Kit'' on '''AnandTech'''] *[https://www.anandtech.com/show/10596/hot-chips-2016-nvidia-discloses-tegra-parker-details ''Chips 2016: NVIDIA Discloses Tegra Parker Details'' on '''AnandTech'''] :SoC: [[nVIDIA]] ''Logan'' (Tegra K1), ''Erista'' (Tegra X1), ''Parker'' (Tegra X2)
==See also== :[[List of Single-board computers]] *''[[nVIDIA Jetson TK1]]'' - [[nVIDIA]] Tegra K1 ''Logan'' (Quad Core, 4+1-cores) :4x ARM Cortex-A15 @2.3GHz, 1x "Low-Power Core", 5 (4+1) cores; :GPU: [[nVIDIA]] GK20A ''Kepler'' (192x CUDA) @950MHz; RAM: 2GB (DDR3L) *''[[nVIDIA Jetson TX1]]'' - [[nVIDIA]] Tegra X1 ''Erista'' (Quad Core, 2x 4-cores) :4x ARM Cortex-A57 @1.9GHz, 4x ARM Cortex-A53 @1.3GHz; 8 (4+4) cores; :GPU: [[nVIDIA]] GM20B ''Maxwell'' (256x CUDA) @1GHz; RAM: 4GB (LPDDR4) *''[[nVIDIA Jetson TX2]]'' - [[nVIDIA]] Tegra X2 ''[https://www.anandtech.com/show/10596/hot-chips-2016-nvidia-discloses-tegra-parker-details Parker]'' (Quad Core, 4+2-cores) :4x ARM Cortex-A57 @2.0GHz, 2x Denver 2 @2.0GHz; 6 (4+2) cores; :GPU: [[nVIDIA]] GP10B ''Pascal'' (256x CUDA) @1.4GHz; RAM: 8GB (LPDDR4) *''[[nVIDIA Shield (P2897)]]'' - [[nVIDIA]] Tegra X1 (Quad Core, 2x 4-cores) :FCC ID: VOB-P2897 (2016-08-29) - ''Game Console'' :Flash: 16GB, RAM: 3GB; WLAN: 802.11abgn/ac (2T2R) :Ports: 1x GbE LAN, 2x USB 3.0, HDMI *''[[OUYA Game Console (OUYA1)]]'' - [[nVIDIA]] Tegra 3 (Quad Core) @1.7GHz :4x ARM Cortex-A9; GPU: [[nVIDIA]] GeForce (ULP); RAM: 1GB (DDR3)
[[Category:English Documentation]]
